label: Kim, Jung N. & Ken-Ichi Hayashi.  2003. Syncrangon, a new crangonid genus, with redescriptions of S. angusticauda (De Haan) and S. dentata (Balss) (Crustacea, Decapoda, Caridea) from East Asian waters. Zoological Science 20(5): 669–682.
